text: Bani Isroil ʙaroi Pajomʙari Alloh va rasulas Muhammad (sallalohu alajhi va sallam) guftand: «Dilhoi mo dar parda ast va suxani tu ʙa qalʙi mo nameguzarad». Na, amr in tavr nest, cunon ki iddao kardand, ʙalki dilason la'nat karda sudaast va ʙar on muhre nihoda sudaast va az rahmati Alloh, ʙa saʙaʙi kufre, ki mevarzand, ʙerun sudand. Pas kame az onho imon meovarand va hol on ki imonason ʙa onho naf' namerasonad
